title.rendered: Parliamentary panels unhappy with funding delays by ministries

content.rendered:
Several parliamentary panels have raised questions and expressed unhappiness in their latest reports over inadequate spending and delayed fund release by Union ministries in 2022-23 while the latter have pointed to the expenditure department’s stiff 2021 fund flow parameters for the same.

Factor this, the school education department was provided an outlay of ‘37,383.36 cr in BE 2022-23. However, at RE stage, it was reduced to ‘32,151.66 cr. Of this, the department was able to utilize only ..

Source : https://tinyurl.com/yc7madtd
